descriptions.400: Your request flows in the wrong direction, like a river fighting its course. Adjust your path and let it flow naturally downstream.
descriptions.401: This stream requires permission to access, like a protected watershed. Show your credentials to enter these waters.
descriptions.402: Access to these pristine waters requires payment. Like a national park, preservation has a cost. Consider contributing.
descriptions.403: These falls are restricted, like private property along the riverbank. The waters here are protected. Find another stream.
descriptions.404: Like water finding its path around stones, this page has flowed elsewhere. Let the current guide you to where you need to be.
descriptions.405: That method won't work in these waters, like swimming against a waterfall. Try a different approach that flows with nature.
descriptions.406: The format you seek is incompatible with this stream. Like mixing fresh and saltwater, it simply doesn't blend here.
descriptions.408: The stream has slowed to a trickle and timed out. Even rivers need rain to flow. Give it time and try again.
descriptions.409: Two currents collide here, creating turbulence. Like waters meeting at a confluence, there's temporary chaos. Refresh and flow again.
descriptions.410: This spring has dried up permanently. Like seasonal streams, not all waters flow forever. Find a new source.
descriptions.413: Your payload is too heavy, like flood waters overwhelming the banks. Lighten your load and let it flow more gently.
descriptions.429: You're moving too fast through the rapids. Even waterfalls need time to cascade down. Slow your pace and try again.
descriptions.500: The dam has failed and the server is flooded. Our engineers are working to restore the natural flow. Patience, like erosion, takes time.
descriptions.502: The bridge across this stream has washed out. The connection between shores is broken. Wait while we rebuild the crossing.
descriptions.503: The river is resting, like a stream in drought season. Services will flow again when the rains return. Check back soon.
descriptions.504: The stream's connection timed out before reaching the ocean. Even water's journey has obstacles. Try letting it flow again.
descriptions.default: Like water finding its path around stones, this page has flowed elsewhere. Let the current guide you to where you need to be.

footers.400: Adjust your course with the current
footers.404: Like water, flow with the journey
footers.406: Find waters that match your flow
footers.408: Good things flow to those who wait
footers.410: Dry springs give way to new sources
footers.429: Rapids teach us to slow down
footers.504: All streams reach the ocean eventually
footers.default: Like water, flow with the journey
